name: The mysterious stones
description:
This game is an updated version of "Le mystère des pierres" (which is available only in french), a game developed for the 60 hours "Pot-au-Jeu" game jam (organized by the french youtuber At0mium).

Instructions:

  • Add stones to the currently active starting stone ->, paying attention to the notches on the edges
  • The stones added correctly are highlighted in blue:
  • Then go to the transform stone to start the execution of the program you wrote
  • Press F to toggle fullscreen mode (when the game has started, not in the menu)
  • Press G to display the grid all the time
